messages.content: is the find my iphone app automatically installed
Yes, it comes pre-installed and is enabled on eligible devices.
does the same genotype always result in the same phenotype
Not always; environment and interactions can alter phenotype outcomes.
is in n out only located in california
No, In-N-Out is also located in Nevada and offers limited locations in other states.
does dying light the following enhanced edition come with the original game
No, it is a standalone expansion and doesn't include the original.
is let there be light a true story
No, it’s a phrase implying a wish for illumination, not an actual event.
is a father in law considered a relative
Yes, a father-in-law is indeed a relative, as he is a parent of your spouse.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel is not part of the European Economic Area.
is st kitts and nevis a us territory
No, it is an independent country, not a US territory.
is it possible to be allergic to rain water
Yes, especially if rainwater interacts with pollen or other allergens.
do all rhombuses have 2 pairs of parallel sides
Yes, each pair of opposite sides in a rhombus is parallel and equal in length.
